1.0.2.name: wordpress/another-wordpress-seo-plugin
1.0.2.description: Auto add keywords and description in the head meta of home,single,page,category and tag. Help seo for head meta tag. Languages:English, Chinese simplified(zh_CN). The illustration is available here:another-wordpress-seo-plugin, or in AWSP-option after installation. If you translate it, please notice me.
